message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $80 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $100. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're getting close to the sweet spot! I'm willing to compromise further and offer $97.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to meet you at $95. What do you think?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not meeting in the middle. I'm willing to meet you at $90, which is the highest I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to accept that price?
I understand you're getting close to your limit, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to meet you at $92.50. It's the best I can do.
